title: US Open tennis 2025: Jannik Sinner v Félix Auger-Aliassime, men’s semi-final – live
summary: Bryan Armen Graham will provide live updates on the second men's semi-final at Flushing Meadows. Fans can follow the game-by-game report for real-time insights. Tune in for all the action as the match unfolds.

title: Saipan review – football scandal makes for thrilling big-screen drama
summary: Steve Coogan and Éanna Hardwicke star in a compelling workplace drama that delves into the tumultuous events surrounding a 2002 tabloid scandal involving football figures Mick McCarthy and Roy Keane. The film expertly navigates themes of conflict and media sensationalism. Their performances drive an engaging narrative centered on high-pressure dynamics in the sports world.

title: Alcaraz too strong as he beats Djokovic in straight sets to reach US Open final
summary: Carlos Alcaraz, a 22-year-old Spaniard, defeated 38-year-old Novak Djokovic with a score of 6-4, 7-6 (4), 6-2. This victory secures Alcaraz's place in his third consecutive Grand Slam final. The match showcased Alcaraz's dominance over the seasoned champion.

title: US Open tennis 2025: Carlos Alcaraz beats Novak Djokovic to reach final – as it happened
summary: Carlos Alcaraz secured a victory over Novak Djokovic with a score of 6-4, 7-6 (4), 6-2. This win positions him for a likely final against Jannik Sinner. Djokovic, aged 38, faced elimination yet again in a grand slam semi-final.

title: Five Great Reads: the ‘trad family’ movement, revenge quitters and how Blue Murder transfixed Australia
summary: Guardian Australia provides a summary of key news stories over the past week, curated by Kris Swales. The wrap highlights essential reads and important developments across various topics. It serves as a concise overview for readers seeking to catch up on significant events.
